issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.summary: Outputs declaration not fully honored in CloudFormation
fields.environment:
* single cluster, non-HA
* 1 x CLC, DNS, Cloudformation
* 1 x UFS
* 1 x UFS, Walrus
* 1 x CC, SC (Overlay)
* 2 x NCs

comments.body: [~hspencer], please try with the latest testing branch of euca2ools.

[~viglesias], 

I checked the master branch of euca2ools on Github.  Looks like its showing correctly now.

{code}
[root@odc-f-13 euca2ools]# euca-version
euca2ools 3.1.0-17-g941498f (Omega)
eucalyptus 4.0.1

[root@odc-f-13 ~]# euform-describe-stacks --region account1-user01@ --debug

Will the packages on release-repo be updated with this version of euca2ools?
